name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3
description:
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 is an arcade-fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It came out on 22-12-2005. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 is available on PlayStation 2.
Hiroshi Matsuyama produced the game. It was directed by Hiroshi Matsuyama. Chikayo Fukuda and Seizo Nakata scored the game.
